Package com.terei.jvector.paint.shapes

Class Summary
Line This class stores all the information about a line, and manages its drawing.
LineManager Manages the operations for drawing a line.
Oval This class stores all the information about a oval, and manages its drawing.
Oval2D Class that provides some similar functions to a java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D, but doesn't have the problem with outlines.
OvalManager Manages the operations for drawing a oval.
Polygon This class stores all the information about a polygon, and manages its drawing.
PolygonManager Manages the operations for drawing a polygon.
Rectangle This class stores all the information about a rectangle, and manages its drawing.
Rectangle_2D Class that provides some similar functions to a java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D, but doesn't have the problem with outlines.
RectangleManager Manages the operations for drawing a rectangle.
Shape Lays a few basic properties/methods that all shapes must have.
ShapeManager Provides an interface to use for managers of the various shapes.
Text This class stores all the information about a String of Text, and manages its drawing.
TextManager  
 

Enum Summary
ShapeManager.Mode The Current Mode the shape manager is in.
Shapes
